help-file.title: "CLOAK OF FEAR"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Fear
When cast, this spell causes the caster to assume the visage of the worst nightmare of everyone else in the room. The immense and sudden fear can cause anyone not grouped with the caster to flee in terror in a random direction.
